Medium: Cover with letterpress typographic design on front; 5 hectographed illustrations (1 by Kruchenykh, 2 by Filonov, 1 by Burliuk, 1 by Rogovin); rubber-stamped text designs, and hectographed manuscript text and designs
Artist: Vladimir Burliuk, Pavel Filonov, Aleksei Kruchenykh, Il'ia Rogovin
CreditLine: Gift of The Judith Rothschild Foundation
Title: Zamaul' III
